body_html:
are you running this in a docker environment? what i see is an error message complaining about driver version being too low, but if you installed cuda75 binaries, i see no reason that this error message should happen.

can you also try: conda uninstall pytorch
and then reinstalling the cuda75 version.
body_text:
are you running this in a docker environment? what i see is an error message complaining about driver version being too low, but if you installed cuda75 binaries, i see no reason that this error message should happen.
can you also try: conda uninstall pytorch
and then reinstalling the cuda75 version.
body:
are you running this in a docker environment? what i see is an error message complaining about driver version being too low, but if you installed cuda75 binaries, i see no reason that this error message should happen. 

can you also try: conda uninstall pytorch
and then reinstalling the cuda75 version.
